name: Take-Kol
description:
Endless match-3, where you can move any piece, but need to keep scoring to keep playing. 

Score by matching 3 or more pieces. Get extra moves by scoring. Just keep going.

Final code, game design and animation by me

Project files: https://github.com/psiquedelicous/Take-Kol

Sprites by Kenney (1-Bit Pack)

Music and sounds from Youtube Audio Library

Basic match-3 code by Razeware LLC

Once more, thanks to Pedro Caetano for all the help
